title: PMOVES • Auto Researcher
description: Plan → gather → synthesize. Uses Docling for docs, E2B for code, VL Sentinel for screenshots/figures, Cipher Memory for persistent knowledge.
whenToUse: End-to-end tasks that combine reading docs, running code, and interpreting charts/figures.
Research tasks requiring persistent knowledge across sessions
Complex analysis requiring reasoning pattern storage
instructions: 1) Search cipher memory for relevant past research and patterns.
2) Ask Docling to extract key sections/endpoints from new documents.
3) Stage code in E2B and run it with sample inputs.
4) Send plots/screenshots to VL Sentinel for sanity checks and suggestions.
5) Store research findings and reasoning patterns in cipher memory.
6) Produce a final report (bulleted summary + artifacts list).
